hanzi-su-wiki:
誇

Значения

Гордиться; горделивый; хвастаться

Мнемоника

Гордые речи 言. Справа — говорить о том, что стал большим 大 и толстым, даже одышка 亏 появилась.

Варианты

夸
purpleculture_pinyin:
kuā
to boast; to exaggerate; to praise
хвастаться; преувеличивать; хвалить
rtega_mnemonic:
誇誇RSexaggerate, brag, boast, flaunt
  • speak 言 extravagantly 夸
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 夸)
Ideographic: Extravagant 夸 words 言; 夸 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
誇張 [ kuā zhāng ]: to exaggerate; overstated; exaggerated; hyperbole; (coll.) excessive; ridiculous; outrageous
誇大 [ kuā dà ]: to exaggerate
誇獎 [ kuā jiǎng ]: to praise; to applaud; to compliment
誇耀 [ kuā yào ]: to brag about; to flaunt
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 夸 [ kuā ] extravagant, luxurious; handsome
heisig_chinese_memo: The hunter's brag: I say, it was a "big one", but the snare broke and it got away.
heisig_constituent: boast, say, words, keitai, mouth, Batman, large, St. Bernard, chandelier, one, ceiling, snare
heisig_story: Words . . . St. Bernard dog . . . ceiling . . . snare.
koohiiStory1: The hunter´s boast: I say, it was a "big one", but the snare broke and it got away. (credit to many others before).
koohiiStory2: A dog owner boasts about how obedient, not how smart, his Saint Bernard dog is. "Why, my dog will even walk right into a trap if I tell him to. Watch!" With a single word, "go!", his dog obediently runs into a snare trap hanging from the ceiling. In a flash, the dog is netted tightly and swinging from the ceiling. Don´t forget the ceiling!
jp_example_words:
誇張(こちょう): exaggeration
誇る(ほこる): to boast of, to be proud of
誇り(ほこり): pride
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: "Say 'big,' ground beggar! Have pride!"
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You are trying to tell a beggar on the ground to say they are big, because you want to make the beggar feel a little pride. "Have pride in your job as a beggar!" you tell them.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After giving some pride to the ground beggar, he looks up at you and tears off his beard and skin. "I am a 子 (こ) again, thanks to you!"
WaniKani_Reading_Info: I'm not sure why gaining pride made the beggar revert back to being a child, but it seems like you did something good, maybe?

  • преувеличение, гипербола, раздутость

  • преувеличивать, хвалиться, похваляться

Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 勹 (обёртка), 大 (большой), 言 (слово)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: boast (夸) with words (言) = boast
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The St. Bernard likes to brag by barking as his owner catches fish with his snake hook.

誇字的基本解释

誇
kuā

誇
kuà
均见“夸”。

誇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuā］
［《廣韻》苦瓜切，平麻，溪。］
(1)夸口；夸大。
(2)夸示，夸耀。
(3)夸奖，夸赞。
(4)粗；大。
(5)美丽。
(6)诞妄。

誇字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誇； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1161第02
〔古文〕?【唐韻】苦瓜切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】枯瓜切，?音夸。【說文】譀也。【玉篇】逞也。【廣韻】大言也。【史記·日者傳】多言誇，嚴莫大於此矣。【前漢·揚雄傳】誇詡衆庶。【晉書·成公綏傳】大而不誇。　又大也。【前漢·外戚傳】妾誇布服糲食。【孟康註】誇，大也。大布之衣也。　又【廣雅】誇誇，切切也。　又【集韻】通作夸。【前漢·楊僕傳】懷銀黃，夸鄕里。　又【韻會】或作侉。【書·畢命】驕淫矜侉。　又【集韻】區遇切，驅去聲。歌也。　又叶苦禾切，音科。【韓愈·讀東方朔雜事詩】頷頭可其奏，送以紫玉珂。方朔不懲創，挾恩更矜誇。　【干祿字書】一作誇。【字彙補】譌作?。【韻會】當从夸。俗作?，非是。誇字的夸原从大从亐（于）作。

暂无。

Name meaning

kuā, qù
вм. 夸
Radicals: 言, 大, 一  (say, big, ground, beggar)
Meaning Mnemonic
"Say 'big,' ground beggar! Have pride!"
You are trying to tell a beggar on the ground to say they are big, because you want to make the beggar feel a little pride. "Have pride in your job as a beggar!" you tell them.
Reading Mnemonic
After giving some pride to the ground beggar, he looks up at you and tears off his beard and skin. "I am a 子 (こ) again, thanks to you!"
I'm not sure why gaining pride made the beggar revert back to being a child, but it seems like you did something good, maybe?
